fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Point a laser pointer into the sky. (1 Night Cooldown)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- An aircraft will be distracted by the laser pointer and fall out of the sky, dealing an Unstoppable Astral Rampage attack to someone at random. The aircraft will never target a Criminal or someone visited by a Criminal.
- Roleblock and Redirect immunity.
